```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RCurl)
x <- getURL("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/noelito77/STAT-331-DATA/main/eg_fec_rnew_zs.csv")
y <- getURL("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/noelito77/STAT-331-DATA/main/yearly_co2_emissions_1000_tonnes.csv")

energy_data<- read.csv(text = x)
co2_data <- read.csv(text = y)


```

```{r}
energy_data_piv <- energy_data |>
  pivot_longer(cols = !country,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "Percent_Consumption")

co2_data_piv <-co2_data |>
  select(country, X1989:X2017) |> 
    pivot_longer(cols = !country,
               names_to = "year",
               values_to = "1000_metric_tonnes")

merged_data <- left_join(co2_data_piv, energy_data_piv)

```
